title.en: Japanese Tokusatsu Film Master Retsuden: Godzilla Madness

altTitles.ja-ro: Japanese Tokusatsu Film Master Retsuden 2 Mechagodzilla Madness

altTitles.ja: 日本特撮映画師列伝 ゴジラ狂時代
日本特撮映画師列伝2 メカゴジラ狂時代

description.en:
The documentary manga "Japanese Tokusatsu Film Master Retsuden Godzilla Madness", which depicts the
half -life of the staff of the "Godzilla" series based on interviews and actual experiences, was published by Shinji Nishikawa from 1999 to 2003 in the "Monthly Shonen Magazine Extra Edition Magazine".

GREAT" series of "Nihon Tokusatsu Eigashi Retsuden".
In the new edition, only six episodes related to Godzilla will be compiled.
Draw the cover and postscript. 6 pages of introductory color gallery.
At the end of the book, many design drawings of the "Godzilla" series that Shinji Nishikawa was involved in are recorded with explanations.

▼ Contents
A documentary cartoon depicting the half-life of the staff of the "Godzilla" series, including Shinji Nishikawa himself, based on interviews and actual experiences. Shinji Nishikawa shines a spotlight on the many interesting episodes of Toho's special effects staff, including director Koichi Kawakita, who was involved in Godzilla.

The title and contents of each story are as follows.
◇ "Godzilla Madness": Shinji Nishikawa of Design Works
◇ "The man who fought Godzilla": Suit actor Kenryu Hanabe
◇ "Blast King Nabe-san": Tadaaki Watanabe of special effects (gunpowder)
◇ "I made it Kaiju": Shinichi Wakasa, the creator of monster modeling
◇"Millennium Genesis": Introducing the behind-the-scenes production of "Godzilla 2000 Millennium"
◇"Mechagodzilla Madness": Introducing the behind-the-scenes of "Godzilla x Mechagodzilla"
